42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: The Jews were split up into seventy-one or seventy-two sects; and the Christians were split up into seventy one or seventy-two sects; and my community will be split up into seventy-three sects
